#labels Featured
===Why to use certificate?===
  * Vista and Windows7 «User account control» confirmation will be more friendly.<br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/Result.png" title="ConEmu. UAC confirmation">
  * Some antiviral programs ([http://www.kaspersky.com/ AVP] for example) automatically place signed programs to trusted zone.

===How to install certificate?===
*Download [http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate/ConEmu.cer.7z Certificate] and unpack it.*

*!DoubleClick on certificate file* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/Step1.png" title="ConEmu. Install certificate. Step1">

*Press «Install certificate»* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/Step2.png" title="ConEmu. Install certificate. Step2">

*Import !ConEmu.cer* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/Step3.png" title="ConEmu. Install certificate. Step3">

*Choose «Trusted Root Certification Authorities»* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/Step4.png" title="ConEmu. Install certificate. Step4">

*Press _Finish_* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/Step5.png" title="ConEmu. Install certificate. Step5">

*Click _Yes_ in the «Security Warning» dialog* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/Step6.png" title="ConEmu. Install certificate. Step6">

*Certificate is ready* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/Certificate.Win7.Ru/StepFin.png" title="ConEmu. Install certificate. Finish">

*Start mmc console (depress _WinR_, type _mmc_ and press _Enter_)* <br>

*Certificate is ready* <br>
